article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: Hamas  gunmen  launched  an  unprecedented  assault  on  Israel  from  the  Gaza  Strip  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  about  240  hostages.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: More  than  18,600  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  government.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: Israel  claims  to  have  killed  thousands  of  Hamas  fighters  during  the  war,  including  many  commanders.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: The  IDF  says  115  Israeli  soldiers  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  ground  offensive  on  27  October.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: In  total,  444  soldiers  have  been  killed  since  7  October,  the  vast  majority  of  them  in  Hamas's  attacks  that  day.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: Nineteen  of  them  are  presumed  dead,  according  to  Reuters  news  agency.

article_title: Why are Israel and Hamas fighting in Gaza?
sentence: The  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people,  most  of  them  civilians,  in  a  series  of  raids  on  military  posts,  kibbutzim  and  a  music  festival,  and  took  hostages  back  into  Gaza.
